https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tfIoo9GIbhgHpmF7B2UpQLh0jIL.jpg Mugiko, an 18-year-old attempts to escape her unhappiness with village life by going to Tokyo to live and work in the geisha house run by her aunt. The daughter of a once great geisha, Mugiko is entitled by blood to train in the geishas ancient art of classical Japanese song and dance. BU・SU
